attributes.action: President Donald Trump should be encouraged to make an official State Visit.
attributes.additional_details: The British people recognise and acknowledge the decision of the American people to elect Donald Trump as their President.  Accordingly, during the term of his presidency, we will extend to President Trump all of the usual courtesies afforded to the head of state of a democracy.  This naturally includes encouraging President Trump to make an official State Visit to the UK at the earliest possible opportunity.
attributes.background: President Donald Trump should be encouraged to make an official State Visit to the UK in his capacity as head of the US Government and leader of the free world.
